## IBasePicker.getDayMonthOffset() method

Used to get difference between first weekday and 1st month start day

**Signature:**

```typescript
getDayMonthOffset(index?: 0 | 1): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

index


</td><td>

0 \| 1


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ 0: current, 1: next \| '1' used when `twoSide` is true

Always returns 0 if `dayRenderType` is `fill`


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

number
